title: Tin Foil Hat Ep 24: CIA Cocaine Dealing With Freeway Ricky Ross
description:
Welcome to another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode, Sam and Ryan, welcome legendary crack dealer Freeway Ricky Ross. This episode we discuss....
1) His new book "Freeway Rick Ross: The Untold Autobiography"
2) Crack Cocaine and the CIA
3)Oscar Danilo Blandon
4)Gary Webb and the Dark Alliance
5)Gangsta Rap
6)The Heroine Epidemic
7)FX's "Snowfall" and the Rapper Rick Ross
For more on Ricky Ross check out his website http://www.freewayrickyross.com
